I have had the good fortune to provide coding hands on and off for the last few weeks for unbound, a wonderful idea, kind of like kickstarter for books but with so much more going on from the initial book pitch right up to printing, binding and delivery. Great people with a great vision. On Monday September 12th I’ll be popping along to their 5 X 15 event at The Tabernacle, which should be a wordy hoot.
